Default.PoolId: Federated Identities -> Edit identity pool -> Identity pool ID. (eg. us-west-2:fc4d19b1-873f-44d8-bdcf-3a8e7aabf3ea)
UserPool -> General settings -> Pool Id. (eg. us-west-2_example)
Default.AppClientId: UserPool -> General settings -> App clients -> Show Details. (eg. 3tcegaot7efa8abgn1fxnebq5)
Default.AppClientSecret: UserPool -> General settings -> App clients -> Show Details. (eg. dse11rx91vs1t9600uacc0ssw1byju8em3k60271n748s26ts9l)
